0001101000110001 1011100010110010 0 -> sum: 1101001011100011, cout: 0

0100011000011101 0011111010011100 1 -> sum: 1000010010111010, cout: 0
1110101101110110 1000010101100100 1 -> sum: 0111000011011011, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
